mobile.productDescription: Redmi Note 13 5G (Arctic White, 6GB RAM, 128GB Storage) | 5G Ready | 120Hz Bezel-Less AMOLED | 7.mm Slimmest Note Ever | 108MP Pro-Grade Camera
mobile.productAbout1: Display: 6.6 inch FHD+ pOLED (1080x2400) Ultra-narrow bezels Display with 120Hz Refresh rate; 1000nits peak brightness; Corning Gorilla Glass 5 Display Protection
mobile.productAbout2: Processor:Mediatek Dimensity 6080 6nm Octa-core 5G processor for high performance ; Up to 2.4GHz; Upto 12GB RAM including 6GB Virtual RAM
mobile.productAbout3: Camera: 108MP 3X in-sensor zoom AI Triple Camera with 8MP Ultra Wide sensor and 2MP Macro camera| 16MP Front camera
mobile.productAbout4: Battery: 5000 mAh large battery with 33W fast charger in-box and Type-C connectivity
mobile.productAbout5: Memory, Storage & SIM: 6GB RAM | 128GB UFS 2.2 | Dual SIM (nano+nano) 5G
